Tsonam Cleanse Akpeloo bụ onye Ghana na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba na teknụzụ
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke SUKU Technologies na onye isi oche maka mpaghara Greater Accra maka Association of Ghana Industries (AGI).

Akpeloo nwere nzere bachelọ nke nka na akụ na ụba na sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, na nzere masta na njikwa iwu akụ na ụba site na Mahadum Ghana.  O nwere akara ugo mmụta na Management Information Systems site na Mahadum Nkà na Ụzụ Ghana, ma mụọkwa Jungian Psychology site na Institute of Humanities and Social Sciences, Mahadum Gavel, Sweden. Ọ bụ ngwaahịa nke Clark Atlanta Business School (United States) na Stanford SEED Programme nke Stanford Graduate School of Business. Akpeloo bụ nwata akwụkwọ nke African Liberty Academy na Diplo Foundation, ma jide diploma na njikwa ego site na Chartered Institute of Marketing.

Tsonam bụ ọkachamara IT ma bụrụkwa onye isi oche nke SUKU Technologies na onye isi oche na-anọchite anya Association of Ghana Industries. Ọ bụkwa onye nchoputa na onye isi nchịkwa nke Techcom Visions, ụlọ ọrụ IT na Ghana. Tsonam bụ onye isi oche mba nke ngalaba ICT nke Ghana National Chamber of Commerce and Industry (GNCCI).  Ọ na-arụkwa ọrụ dị ka onye isi oche nke ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ gụnyere na Accra Technical University, NVTI CMMTI na Methodist University College of Ghana. Ọ bụ onye ndu Kadodo Africa, ọnụ ụzọ dị elu nke na-enyocha profaịlụ, na-enyocha, na-enyocha ma na-akwalite òtù dị iche iche na Ghana na Africa iji mee ka ha dị maka uru nke Mpaghara Azụmahịa Azụmahịa Africa Continental (AfCFTA).
